markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Vexing Vapor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1278)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 27</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This flask contains a fine red powder made from toxic berries. A vexing vapor bomb deals the listed mental damage and mental [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage. On a hit, the target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check before taking actions with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait. This lasts until the end of its next turn (1 minute on a critical hit).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Limited"
>
Vexing Vapor (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 27</row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d6 mental damage and 1 mental splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Limited"
>
Vexing Vapor (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 27</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d6 mental damage and 2 mental splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Limited"
>
Vexing Vapor (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 27</row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d6 mental damage and 3 mental splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Limited"
>
Vexing Vapor (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 27</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4d6 mental damage and 4 mental splash damage.
name: Vexing Vapor (Major)
